name: Atmospheric Duct Interference Reduction
summary: The Atmospheric Duct Interference Reduction feature reduces the interference between

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_DUCT_INTERFERENCE_REPORT
parameters.description: The number of TTIs in which duct interference slope is                                     detected.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_DUCT_INTERFERENCE_REPORT
parameters.description: Correlation peak value of characteristic sequence which consists                                     of a sequence of 30 bits, high 15 bits for the first half radio                                     frame, low 15 bits for the second radio frame.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_DUCT_INTERFERENCE_REPORT
parameters.description: The total accumulated number of characteristic sequence                                     detected.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_DUCT_INTERFERENCE_REPORT
parameters.description: Content of detected characteristic sequence which consists of a                                     sequence of 31 bits, high 7 bits for sequence power, in dB based                                     on -160 dBm, -160 dBm ~ -33 dBm, middle 4 bits for symbol index,                                     low 20 bits for decoded characteristic information.
